hero.badge: Yoruba ko tii si nile bayii
hero.title: Bridging Cultures Through
hero.subtitle: Expert Translation
hero.description: For over a decade, we've been Nigeria's trusted translation partner, helping businesses, organizations, and individuals communicate effectively across languages and cultures.

story.title: Our Story: From Local Vision to Global Impact
story.para1: Founded in 2010 in the heart of Lagos, ILI-Nigeria began with a simple yet powerful vision: to break down language barriers that prevent Nigerian businesses from accessing global opportunities.
story.para2: What started as a small team of passionate linguists has grown into Nigeria's premier translation and interpretation service, trusted by government agencies, multinational corporations, and individual professionals across Africa and beyond.
story.para3: Today, we're proud to serve clients in over 50 languages, with a team of certified translators who understand not just words, but the cultural nuances that make communication truly effective.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Breaking barriers, building bridges
mission.description: To provide world-class translation and interpretation services that enable seamless communication across cultures, empowering Nigerian businesses and individuals to thrive in the global marketplace.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: A connected, multilingual world
vision.description: To be Africa's leading language services provider, recognized globally for our expertise, cultural sensitivity, and commitment to excellence in translation and interpretation.

values.title: Values That Guide Everything We Do
values.subtitle: Our core values are the foundation of our service excellence and the reason thousands of clients trust us with their most important communications.

precision.title: Precision & Accuracy
precision.desc: We maintain the highest standards of accuracy in every translation project, ensuring your message is conveyed exactly as intended.

cultural.title: Cultural Sensitivity
cultural.desc: Understanding cultural nuances is at the heart of effective translation. We respect and preserve cultural context in every project.

speed.title: Speed & Efficiency
speed.desc: We understand deadlines matter. Our streamlined processes ensure rapid delivery without compromising quality.

trust.title: Trust & Confidentiality
trust.desc: Your documents are secure with us. We maintain strict confidentiality protocols and secure handling procedures.

timeline.title: Our Journey Through the Years
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones that shaped ILI-Nigeria into the trusted translation partner we are today

0.title: Foundation
0.desc: ILI-Nigeria was founded with a vision to bridge communication gaps across Nigerian businesses and international partners.

1.title: ISO Certification
1.desc: Achieved ISO 17100 certification, establishing our commitment to international quality standards.

2.title: Digital Expansion
2.desc: Launched our digital platform, enabling seamless online translation services across Africa.

3.title: Regional Leader
3.desc: Became West Africa's leading translation service provider, serving clients across 15+ countries.

4.title: AI Integration
4.desc: Integrated advanced CAT tools and AI-assisted quality assurance while maintaining human expertise.

5.title: Global Recognition
5.desc: Recognized as Nigeria's premier translation service with international partnerships and certifications.

team.title: Meet Our Leadership Team
team.subtitle: The experienced professionals who guide our vision and ensure the highest standards of service delivery across all our operations.

0.desc: 15+ years in linguistics and international business. PhD in Applied Linguistics from University of Niamey, Niger.

1.desc: Expert in translation project management with extensive experience in quality assurance systems.

2.desc: Leading our digital transformation with cutting-edge translation technology and AI integration.

3.desc: Oversees linguistic quality and cultural adaptation across all African and Middle Eastern languages.

cta.title: Ready to Work with Nigeria's Translation Experts?
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust ILI-Nigeria for accurate, culturally-sensitive translation services. Let's help you communicate effectively across languages and cultures.
